Package monsterfighter.core

Interface Purchasable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Item, Monster
public interface Purchasable
Models the purchasable interface that allows an object to be bought from a Shop and sold for gold

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    buyDescription()
    A description of a purchasable object that includes the the buy price of the object and a basic description.

    Gets the purchasable object's buy price.
    int
    getIndex()
    Gets the index value of a purchasable object.
    int
    getSellPrice()
    Gets the purchasable object's sell price.
    String
    sellDescription()
    A description of a purchasable object that includes the the sell price of the object and a basic description.
